snippet: It's washable, rechargeable and transmits information up to 100 feet -- but do you really want an app to tell you when the baby is crying?
abstract: It's washable, rechargeable and transmits information up to 100 feet -- but do you really want an app to tell you when the baby is crying?

headline.main: Coming Soon: The Wearable, Online, All-the-Time Baby Monitor
